content:
SchemaSerializationMode Enum

Definition

Indicates the schema serialization mode for a typed DataSet.

In this Article

public enum SchemaSerializationMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SchemaSerializationMode

Remarks

Setting the SchemaSerializationMode property of a typed DataSet to ExcludeSchema provides the option of omitting schema information from the serialization payload.

Fields

ExcludeSchema

Skips schema serialization for a typed DataSet.
IncludeSchema

Includes schema serialization for a typed DataSet. The default.
